entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 2:08 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: NNE 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
